activity.text:
Hi @aravindm4 @rithviknishad 

I'd like to work on this issue as part of the Full Stack Intern application.

Proposed Solution

1. 1. If the Medicines list is empty, display an “Add” button instead of “Edit”.
2.  If medicines are already present, continue to show the “Edit” button as expected

If approved, please assign this issue to me. Thank you!
